snippet.title: Shatterline - Official Gameplay Reveal
snippet.description:
Play on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2087030/Shatterline/

Join us on Discord: https://discord.gg/shatterline

Shatterline is an arena FPS with a rogue-lite co-op mode (Expedition) as well as several traditional PvP modes such as TDM, Conquest, and Escort. Players can choose from 8 unique Operatives and an armory of 25 unique weapons that can be customized via attachments.
